entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as a student who is trying to avoid Malfoy and Snape. He is hiding under a cloak on the floor.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is described as someone who bursts into the room and then strides away down the corridor.

entities.name: slughorn
entities.description: Slughorn's office door is open, indicating that he may be present in the area.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape emerges slowly from the classroom and returns to the party.

relationships.description: Harry heard Malfoy's footsteps on the other side of the door and flung himself out of the way just as it burst open.
Harry remained crouched down as Snape emerged slowly from the classroom.
